+ def resize_image_for_display(image: Image.Image, target_width: int = None, target_height: int = None) -> Image.Image:
+     """
+     è¡¨ç¤ºç”¨ã«ç”»åƒã‚’ãƒªã‚µã‚¤ã‚ºï¼ˆãƒ¬ã‚¹ãƒãƒ³ã‚·ãƒ–å¯¾å¿œï¼‰

+     Args:
+         image: PIL Imageã‚ªãƒ–ã‚¸ã‚§ã‚¯ãƒˆ
+         target_width: ç›®æ¨™å¹…ï¼ˆæŒ‡å®šã—ãªã„å ´åˆã¯è‡ªå‹•è¨ˆç®—ï¼‰
+         target_height: ç›®æ¨™é«˜ã•ï¼ˆæŒ‡å®šã—ãªã„å ´åˆã¯è‡ªå‹•è¨ˆç®—ï¼‰
+         
+     Returns:
+         ãƒªã‚µã‚¤ã‚ºã•ã‚ŒãŸç”»åƒ
+     """
+     width, height = image.size
+     
+     # ãƒ‡ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ«ãƒˆã®æœ€å¤§è¡¨ç¤ºã‚µã‚¤ã‚ºï¼ˆç”»é¢ã‚µã‚¤ã‚ºã«å¿œã˜ã¦èª¿æ•´ï¼‰
+     max_display_width = 800
+     max_display_height = 600
+     
+     # ã‚¢ã‚¹ãƒšã‚¯ãƒˆæ¯”ã‚’ä¿æŒã—ã¦ãƒªã‚µã‚¤ã‚º
+     if target_width and target_height:
+         # ä¸¡æ–¹æŒ‡å®šã•ã‚ŒãŸå ´åˆã¯ã€ã‚¢ã‚¹ãƒšã‚¯ãƒˆæ¯”ã‚’ä¿æŒã—ã¦ãƒ•ã‚£ãƒƒãƒˆ
+         aspect_ratio = width / height
+         target_aspect_ratio = target_width / target_height
+         
+         if aspect_ratio > target_aspect_ratio:
+             # å¹…ã«åˆã‚ã›ã‚‹
+             new_width = target_width
+             new_height = int(target_width / aspect_ratio)
+         else:
+             # é«˜ã•ã«åˆã‚ã›ã‚‹
+             new_height = target_height
+             new_width = int(target_height * aspect_ratio)
+     elif target_width:
+         # å¹…ã®ã¿æŒ‡å®š
+         new_width = min(target_width, max_display_width)
+         new_height = int(height * new_width / width)
+     elif target_height:
+         # é«˜ã•ã®ã¿æŒ‡å®š
+         new_height = min(target_height, max_display_height)
+         new_width = int(width * new_height / height)
+     else:
+         # ãƒ‡ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ«ãƒˆã‚µã‚¤ã‚º
+         if width > height:
+             new_width = max_display_width
+             new_height = int(height * max_display_width / width)
+         else:
+             new_height = max_display_height
+             new_width = int(width * max_display_height / height)
+     
+     # æœ€å°ã‚µã‚¤ã‚ºã®åˆ¶é™
+     new_width = max(new_width, 100)
+     new_height = max(new_height, 100)
+     
+     return image.resize((new_width, new_height), Image.Resampling.LANCZOS)
+

+             function resizeImageToFit(img) {
+                 const container = img.closest('.stImage') || img.parentElement;
+                 if (!container) return;
+                 
+                 const containerWidth = container.offsetWidth;
+                 const containerHeight = container.offsetHeight;
+                 const imgWidth = img.naturalWidth;
+                 const imgHeight = img.naturalHeight;

+                 
+                 let newWidth, newHeight;
+                 
+                 if (aspectRatio > containerAspectRatio) {
+                     // å¹…ã«åˆã‚ã›ã‚‹

+                     newHeight = containerWidth / aspectRatio;
+                 } else {
+                     // é«˜ã•ã«åˆã‚ã›ã‚‹
+                     newHeight = containerHeight;
+                     newWidth = containerHeight * aspectRatio;
+                 }
+                 
+                 // æœ€å°ã‚µã‚¤ã‚ºã®åˆ¶é™
+                 newWidth = Math.max(newWidth, 100);
+                 newHeight = Math.max(newHeight, 100);
+                 
+                 img.style.width = newWidth + 'px';
+                 img.style.height = newHeight + 'px';
+                 img.style.maxWidth = '100%';
+                 img.style.maxHeight = '100%';
+                 img.style.objectFit = 'contain';
+             }
